Author: NutellaLicka#4241
Content: Have a read of this guide. You'll have to transfer the specific amount from your sprout address to a taddr than to a sapling address

Author: NutellaLicka#4241
Content: You'll want to create a UTXO in your sprout wallet (send 1000 to yourself to do this) then send that exact amount through the wallets minus the transaction fee of 0.0001

Author: AŒõŒõBLŒõCK#4074
Content: is there anyway to do this with in the wallet?

Author: NutellaLicka#4241
Content: I believe you can use the CLI functionality in the wallet, but you will need to make a taddr using CLI as well

Author: NutellaLicka#4241
Content: I believe there is a zMigrate GUI coming out in the next week

Author: NutellaLicka#4241
Content: If you join the Official Pirate discord, they have a z-migrate help channel as well

Author: NutellaLicka#4241
Content: Also, if you're mining, you can just create a new zS(sapling) address and start mining to it with a pool that supports it

Author: mrlynch#5735
Content:
0% Pool fee on https://pool.privatebay.io until 15th Feb 2019 (Sapling Migration Deadline)

A bounty of 100 ARRR will also be paid daily, randomly to miners on the Pool between 15 Jan 2019 and 15 Feb 2019 - winning addresses will be broadcast in #botchat 

Join https://pool.privatebay.io now to take part in the bounty.

Author: JBOARD#9774
Content:
Hello all, I have just joined this group and read many older posts.
Going to ask this question possibly again..
New Agama install v0.32a-beta
I have a zs1 address.
I have been mining for a couple days and have 305.xxx in my wallet.
Q: do I need to migrate address?
Q: who buys ARRR coin here?
Q: Is Digital IO the only exchange online that supports ARRR coin?
Also
Thanks
This project looks really good and I can't wait to see where it goes ..

Author: NutellaLicka#4241
Content:
@JBOARD 
1. Nope, if you have a sapling (Zs) address, you're fine. If you had a zC address, you'd have to migrate. 
2. There is an otc channel over at the official pirate discord, also on the exchange.
3. It currently is, they were the first exchange to implement z-only transactions, which is a big deal. Many other exchanges refused to do it, or did not have the expertise to. 
You can find the official discord at https://discord.gg/PmW4Rh for more information!
